name: Gozoop
overview:
Gozoop is a young and entrepreneurial digital marketing agency that loves creating a wow online presence for all its clients.

Gozoop was brought to inception by 3 very young, innovative and visionary individuals, Ahmed Naqvi, Dushyant Bhatia and Rohan Bhansali. Each one being insightful and holding brilliant expertise in their field of work.

With an average age of 22 years (of its 45 member team), the agency spreads its wings across Mumbai, Dubai & Singapore and has proved to be a cut above the rest.

Having absorbed online marketing into its veins, it initiated a self funded online venture called Zozolo and a review portal called Decidebuddy.com. Gozoop is definitely not your regular digital agency.

Gozoop is a one stop destination for online marketing solutions but above all it takes pride in its awesome and vibrant work culture. Check out their Facebook page to know them better - facebook.com/goZoop.

offices.address1: 18/143, Anand Nagar, Near Vakola Police station, Santacruz E
